{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Finance Officer",
  "description": "New Hope Liuhe, also known as New Hope Agric and Tech, is an agricultural feed manufacturing industry, producing chicken feed, pig feed and also fish feed.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Finance Officer
Job Location:&nbsp;Logbara, Along the Abeokuta Express Way, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	This role involves managing financial transactions, preparing reports, ensuring compliance with regulations, and supporting strategic financial planning.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage accounts payable and receivable, including invoicing and collections.
	Prepare and maintain accurate financial records, ledgers, and journals.
	Assist in the preparation of financial statements, budgets, and forecasts.
	Reconcile bank statements and monitor cash flow.
	Conduct financial analysis to support decision-making.
	Ensure compliance with accounting standards and internal policies.
	Coordinate internal and external audits.
	Track bank deposits, payments, and update financial systems.
	Collaborate with other departments to provide financial guidance.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with experience.


Salary
N80,000 - N100,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;new_hope5@yahoo.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more inquiries, send a WhatsApp message to: 07060589799.",
  "datePosted": "2025-09-30",
  "validThrough": "2025-10-16",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "New Hope Liuhe"
    
  },

      "addressCountry": "NG"

Finance Officer Job at New Hope Liuhe




        
    

        
        New Hope Liuhe, also known as New Hope Agric and Tech, is an agricultural feed manufacturing industry, producing chicken feed, pig feed and also fish feed.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Finance Officer
Job Location: Logbara, Along the Abeokuta Express Way, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	This role involves managing financial transactions, preparing reports, ensuring compliance with regulations, and supporting strategic financial planning.


Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Manage accounts payable and receivable, including invoicing and collections.
	Prepare and maintain accurate financial records, ledgers, and journals.
	Assist in the preparation of financial statements, budgets, and forecasts.
	Reconcile bank statements and monitor cash flow.
	Conduct financial analysis to support decision-making.
	Ensure compliance with accounting standards and internal policies.
	Coordinate internal and external audits.
	Track bank deposits, payments, and update financial systems.
	Collaborate with other departments to provide financial guidance.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with experience.


Salary
N80,000 - N100,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: new_hope5@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more inquiries, send a WhatsApp message to: 07060589799.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Electrical Engineer",
  "description": "Recore Limited is an Outsourcing firm renowned for providing reliable support services to client companies and individuals. Managed by HR professionals, our forte revolves around the provision of skilled and unskilled manpower to our clients; we count on our support staff to offer professionalism and provide services at its best to clients. We take pride in providing the most trusted support services in the Outsourcing industry in Nigeria. Recore Limited is solely owned by Nigerians and has continued to thrive for the last 14 years with clients who enjoy our top-notch services. Other areas of our competencies include Recruitment, Training and Development, HR Consulting.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Electrical Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Magodo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
What We&rsquo;re Looking For:


	Graduate Degree in Electrical Engineering or related field
	Minimum of 5 years of relevant experience
	Experience in independent power plants or renewable energy projects
	Strong project management skills (advantage)
	Excellent troubleshooting &amp; problem-solving abilities


Pay
N200,000 - N300,000 monthly

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;jobs@recoreltdng.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;Be part of a forward-thinking company shaping the future of Nigeria&rsquo;s energy sector.",

Electrical Engineer Job at Recore Limited




        
    

        
        Recore Limited is an Outsourcing firm renowned for providing reliable support services to client companies and individuals. Managed by HR professionals, our forte revolves around the provision of skilled and unskilled manpower to our clients; we count on our support staff to offer professionalism and provide services at its best to clients. We take pride in providing the most trusted support services in the Outsourcing industry in Nigeria. Recore Limited is solely owned by Nigerians and has continued to thrive for the last 14 years with clients who enjoy our top-notch services. Other areas of our competencies include Recruitment, Training and Development, HR Consulting.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Electrical Engineer

Job Location: Magodo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
What We’re Looking For:


	Graduate Degree in Electrical Engineering or related field
	Minimum of 5 years of relevant experience
	Experience in independent power plants or renewable energy projects
	Strong project management skills (advantage)
	Excellent troubleshooting & problem-solving abilities


Pay
N200,000 - N300,000 monthly

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@recoreltdng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Be part of a forward-thinking company shaping the future of Nigeria’s energy sector.    

    

        Click here to Apply
